definitions.definition: A person or thing that hitchhikes .
An item attached to a travel bug and hidden in a geocache to be found and transported to other caches or around the world.
A dance move in which the dancer mimics the motions of someone thumbing a ride .
A bur that attaches and clings to clothing, or a bur - bearing plant.
An advertisement at the end of a programme .

main_definition: A person or thing that hitchhikes .
secondary_definitions: An item attached to a travel bug and hidden in a geocache to be found and transported to other caches or around the world.
( preceded by definite article ) A dance move in which the dancer mimics the motions of someone thumbing a ride .
( informal , botany ) A bur that attaches and clings to clothing, or a bur - bearing plant.
( radio , advertising ) An advertisement at the end of a programme .
